properties.description: Open from Thursday 1st December . Individuals, families, children, elderly people - all are welcome. We have comfortable chairs for all. All are very welcome to come and socialise (or not if they prefer to not to) and charge their phones and enjoy some soup and hot drink whilst keeping warm. We are a friendly and non-judgemental people and anyone is welcome to benefit from our resources.
